name: Microsoft Expression Design Drawing
summary: Learn about .DESIGN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Expression Design is part of the Microsoft Expression Studio suite. However, Microsoft discontinued Expression Studio in 2012.

description: Drawing created with Microsoft Expression Design, a drawing and design program for Windows; may contain both vector and raster graphics; can also include multiple layers and various image effects.
